The hasty hunter remembers how helpful you can be.
objectives: Slay a cracked Ronkan doll for its core.
Deliver the core to the hasty hunter.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03477
dialogue.text: A welcome sight in my hour of need.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03477
dialogue.text: As you know, a number of our stone sentinels have turned against us. But if they can be slain, they may yet serve to protect these ruins.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03477
dialogue.text: We lack the knowledge to build more, but it is possible to use their parts to repair those that yet remain.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03477
dialogue.text: If you could slay even a single sentinel and bring me its core, that is all I require to begin my work.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03477
dialogue.text: I only require a single core to begin my work.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03477
dialogue.text: As I said before, we lack the knowledge to build the sentinels. And this is perhaps the most difficult piece to replicate.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03477
dialogue.text: So long as their cores can be retrieved, we can prolong the life of those we yet have.
